CommSubscriptionChannelType.name: CommSubscriptionChannelType
CommSubscriptionChannelType.description: Represents the engagement channel through which you can reach a customer for a communication subscription.

CommunicationSubscriptionId.description: ID of the associated communication subscription record.

EngagementChannelTypeId.description: ID of the associated engagement channel type record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MessagingChannelUsageId.description: The ID of the associated Messaging channel usage record, which is in turn associated with a messaging channel.

Name.description: Required. Name of the communication subscription channel type record.

OwnerId.description: The ID account owner associated with this customer.
